item.title: Alphabet Music
item.description: More Alphabet Song (Cyrillic) (World With Nathalie, 2018) The russian alphabet song with English subtitles (Apprendre le russe, 2015, 2 m) Cyrillic Alphabet Song (Learn with me, 2015) Sing Russian Alphabet Song (Learn Russian Language, 2013) This one is fun, with singing by Fedor Derkach.

item.title: A Piece of Cake: Russian Alphabet
item.description: Apps Starting simple is recommended. For Android users: Russian alphabet for kids is great for beginners and looks cheerful. Youâ€™ll also learn some basic words right away. Russian Alphabet is less about cheerfulness but is clear and practical. Some example words are (too) difficult for beginners.
